Package edu.nyu.cs.omnidroid.ui.simple

Interface Summary
FactoryDynamicUI.DlgDynamicInput This interface must be implemented by DlgFilterInput so we can support adding dynamic UI elements to it based on the filter type chosen by the end user.
FactoryDynamicUI.DlgPreserveState The DlgFilterInput instance will have to support UI state preservation between orientation changes, but the class won't know what its UI elements are.
FactoryDynamicUI.InputDone The DlgFilterInput instance will have a member instance of this interface.
 

Class Summary
ActivityChooseFiltersAndActions This activity is used to add multiple filters or actions to a new rule.
ActivityChooseRootEvent This activity gives users a chance to pick a root event for a new rule.
ActivityDlgActionInput This dialog is a shell to contain UI elements specific to different actions.
ActivityDlgActions This dialog shows a list of all actions associated with the selected application.
ActivityDlgApplications This dialog shows a list of all applications available for use with actions.
ActivityDlgAttributes This dialog shows a list of attributes linked to the selected root event.
ActivityDlgFilterInput This dialog is a shell to contain UI elements specific to different filters.
ActivityDlgFilters This activity shows a list of all filters associated with the selected attribute.
ActivityDlgRuleName This activity gives the user a chance to supply a rule name and description.
ActivityMain This is the main entry point of the application.
ActivitySavedRules This activity shows all rules currently in the system, and their on/off status.
AdapterRule Our rule has a tree hierarchy to it, we want to display is as a tree in our UI too.
AdapterRule.NodeWrapper Simply bundles a RuleNode with its tree-image int array for display in the UI.
FactoryDynamicUI Static factory class for setting up a dynamic UI for every filter/action type.
RuleBuilder This is a singleton class used to store elements of a rule between different activities as the user either creates a new rule, or edits an existing rule.
UIDbHelperStore This singleton was created to hold an instance of the UIDbHelper class which provides the UI package with representations of the core data.
UtilUI Spare parts for UI work.
